TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi HttpEncoder extends System.Object

span.span: Provides encoding and decoding logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含编码和解码类中的方法使用如的逻辑， ，和。The class contains encoding and decoding logic that is used by methods in classes such as , , and . 可以继承自类并重写其行为以进行自定义默认的编码和解码的 ASP.NET 的行为。You can inherit from the class and override its behavior to customize the default encoding and decoding behavior of ASP.NET. 然后设置属性的类，以配置自定义类。You then set the property of the class to configure your custom class. 用于编码和解码的自定义类派生自可以重写内置 ASP.NET 编码和解码行为或更改只选择了它的方面。A custom class for encoding and decoding that derives from can override the built-in ASP.NET encoding and decoding behavior or change only selected aspects of it. 在 ASP.NET 中来取代或补充以下编码行为，可以配置的自定义编码类型：You can configure the custom encoding type for in ASP.NET to replace or supplement the following encoding behavior: - HTML 编码HTML encoding - HTML 特性编码HTML attribute encoding - URL 编码URL encoding - URL 路径编码URL path encoding - HTTP 标头名称和标头值编码HTTP header name and header value encoding 默认情况下，ASP.NET 应用程序配置为使用键入对于所有输出编码。By default, ASP.NET applications are configured to use the type for all output encoding. 下面的示例从应用程序级别 Web.config 文件显示如何类型设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序：The following example from an application-level Web.config file shows how the type is set for an ASP.NET application: `` 该示例设置中的配置设置类来执行所有输出应用程序中的编码。The configuration setting in the example sets the class to perform all output encoding in the application. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview.

para.span: 如果您创建一个自定义编码器类，重写基方法的类的基类派生的编码器可能引发异常从任何重写方法。

span.span: When you create a custom encoder class and override the base methods of the base class, the derived encoder might throw an exception from any of the overridden methods.

para.span: 但是，在以下情况下引发此类异常可能会导致意外行为在 ASP.NET 中：

span.span: However, in the following cases throwing such an exception could lead to unexpected behavior in ASP.NET:

para.span: -如果 ASP.NET 将呈现一个错误页面，导致未处理的异常引发自定义编码器，ASP.NET 将不会尝试对其错误输出通过调入自定义编码器进行编码。

span.span: - If ASP.NET is rendering an error page that is caused by an unhandled exception that was thrown from a custom encoder, ASP.NET does not attempt to encode its error output by calling into the custom encoder.

para.span: 这样可避免递归错误条件。

span.span: This avoids recursive error conditions.

para.span: -当 ASP.NET HTTP 标头发送到 IIS，ASP.NET 有未经处理的异常无法预配。

span.span: - When ASP.NET is sending HTTP headers to IIS, ASP.NET has no provision for unhandled exceptions.

para.span: 因此，将呈现标准 ASP.NET 错误页 （如果配置设置允许要显示此页）。

span.span: Therefore, the standard ASP.NET error page will be rendered (if configuration settings allows this page to be displayed).

summary.span: 获取或设置将在应用程序中使用的 类型。

span.span: Gets or set the type that will be used in an application.

value.span: 对将要使用的编码器/解码器类型的引用。

span.span: A reference to the encoder/decoder type that will be used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果派生在配置文件中，指定类型属性返回对自定义类型的引用。If a derived type is specified in the configuration file, the property returns a reference to the custom type. 但是，如果使用没有自定义编码器，该属性将返回到默认 ASP.NET 的引用实例。However, if no custom encoder is used, the property returns a reference to the default ASP.NET instance. 属性不是线程安全。The property is not thread-safe. 只能在应用程序中设置此属性`Application_Start`方法，因为`Application_Start`在单个线程上运行。Set this property only in the application's `Application_Start` method, because `Application_Start` runs on a single thread.

exception.span: 分配给此属性的编码器实例是 。

summary.span: 获取对 ASP.NET 的默认编码器的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the default encoder for ASP.NET.
A reference to the default encoder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 常见的编码问题是，默认 ASP.NET行为将"+"字符转换为空格。A common encoding issue is that the default ASP.NET behavior converts spaces into the "+" character. 从历史上看，"+"字符已经成为 Internet 约定，在 URL 中的空格字符编码到更具可读性的方式。Historically, the "+" character has been an Internet convention for encoding space characters in a URL into a more human-readable manner. 但是，根据标准，空格字符是应该为"%20"，而不是编码为"+"字符。However, according to standards, the space character is supposed to be encoded as "%20" and instead of as the "+" character. ASP.NET 使您可以实现更多的标准合规编码算法。ASP.NET lets you implement a more standards compliant encoding algorithm.

param.span: 要编码的 HTTP 标头名称。

param.span: 要编码的 HTTP 标头值。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 将标头名称和值编码为可用作 HTTP 标头的字符串。

span.span: Encodes a header name and value into a string that can be used as an HTTP header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法采用从输入的字符串`headerName`和`headerValue`参数并对它们进行编码。The method takes input strings from the `headerName` and `headerValue` parameters and encodes them. 为输出参数返回已编码的值。The encoded values are returned as out parameters. 方法使用以下逻辑进行编码标头名称和值：The method uses the following logic to encode header names and values: - 其 Unicode 值小于 32，除 ASCII 字符，第 9 的 ASCII 字符的所有字符都都转换为格式的 URL 编码`%NN`其中`N`字符表示十六进制值。All characters whose Unicode value is less than ASCII character 32, except ASCII character 9, are URL-encoded into a format of `%NN` where the `N` characters represent hexadecimal values. - ASCII 字符 9 （水平制表符） 不是 URL 编码。ASCII character 9 (the horizontal tab character) is not URL-encoded. - 127 的 ASCII 字符编码为`%7F`。ASCII character 127 is encoded as `%7F`. - 所有其他字符不进行编码。All other characters are not encoded. > [!NOTE] > 尽管此方法可以用于 Unicode 值，但它通常用于 ASCII 范围内的值。Although this method can be used for Unicode values, it is typically used for values in the ASCII range. 默认实现方法将返回的值`headerValue`中`encodedHeaderValue`如果`headerValue`是`null`或为空字符串。The default implementation of the method returns the value of `headerValue` in `encodedHeaderValue` if `headerValue` is `null` or is an empty string. 同样的默认实现返回的值`headerName`中`encodedHeaderName`如果`headerName`是`null`或为空字符串。Similarly, the default implementation returns the value of `headerName` in `encodedHeaderName` if `headerName` is `null` or is an empty string.

span.span: The string to encode.

param.name: output
param.span: 要将已编码值写入到的文本编写器。

span.span: The text writer to write the encoded value to.

summary.span: 将传入值编码为可插入 HTML 特性（由单引号或双引号分隔）的字符串。

span.span: Encodes an incoming value into a string that can be inserted into an HTML attribute that is delimited by using single or double quotation marks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过使用标准的 HTML 实体对字符进行编码。The method encodes characters by using the standard HTML entities. 例如， `<` （左的尖括号） 编码为`<`并`\`（反斜杠） 编码为`\`。For example, the `<` (left angle bracket) is encoded as `<` and the `\` (backslash) is encoded as `\`. 则可以安全地使用单引号和双引号中的属性中。It is safe to use within single-quoted and double-quoted attributes. 值必须用引号引起来。The values must be quoted.

span.span: is .

param.name: output
param.span: 要将已解码值写入到的文本编写器。

span.span: The text writer to write the decoded value to.

summary.span: 解码 HTML 编码的字符串中的值。

span.span: Decodes a value from an HTML-encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了 ASP.NET 解码逻辑可以解码的字符序列。The following table lists the character sequences that the ASP.NET decoding logic can decode. |字符序列Character sequence|规则Rule| |------------------------|----------| |`&#NNN;` （的 ASCII 字符十进制代码）。`&#NNN;` (decimal codes for ASCII characters).|解码为指定的 ASCII 字符。Decoded as the specified ASCII character. 字符序列之后的 # 字符开始的第一个数字和分号处完成。The character sequence starts at the first digit after the # character and finishes at the semicolon.| |`&#xZZ;` （ASCII 字符的十六进制代码）。`&#xZZ;` (hexadecimal codes for ASCII characters).|解码为指定的 ASCII 字符。Decoded as the specified ASCII character. 该编码的格式而不十进制值使用十六进制字符来指定的字符。The encoded form specifies the character by using hexadecimal characters instead of a decimal value. 字符序列之后的 # 字符开始的第一个数字和分号处完成。The character sequence starts at the first digit after the # character and finishes at the semicolon.| |命名的 HTML 实体。Named HTML entities.|解码为等效的 ASCII 字符。Decoded as the equivalent ASCII character.|

span.span: is .

summary.span: 将字符串编码为 HTML 编码的字符串。

span.span: Encodes a string into an HTML-encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了 ASP.NET 的编码逻辑可以解码的字符序列。The following table lists the character sequences that the ASP.NET encoding logic can decode. |字符Character|编码为Encoded as| |---------------|----------------| |`<` （左的尖括号）`<` (left angle bracket)|`<`| |`>` （右尖括号）`>` (right angle bracket)|`>`| |`"` （双引号）`"` (double quotation marks)|`"`| |`&` （与号）`&` (ampersand)|`&`| |`\` （反斜杠）`\` (backslash)|`\`| |从 160 到 255 之间的 ASCII 字符ASCII characters from 160 to 255|`&#NNN;`其中`NNN`是三位十进制字符代码`&#NNN;`, where `NNN` is the three-digit decimal character code| 如果重写方法，必须生成的安全在 HTML 特性中带双引号或单引号的输出。If you override the method, you must produce output that is also safe within double-quoted or single-quoted HTML attributes. 这适合于在分析由 Razor 引擎，其中标记和代码可以结合使用，如\<标记 attr ="@value">。This accommodates parsing by the Razor engine, where markup and code can be combined, such as \. 此外，@ 运算符不是上下文感知当 Razor 引擎进行处理，因此它将调用而非。In addition, the @ operator is not context-aware when processed by the Razor engine, therefore it calls rather than .

span.span: is .

Encodes a string.
An encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks URL 编码可确保所有浏览器正确地传输 URL 字符串中的文本。URL encoding makes sure that all browsers correctly transmit text in URL strings. 可能会截断或某些浏览器已损坏等问号 （？）、 and 符 (&)、 斜杠 （/） 和空格字符。Characters such as a question mark (?), ampersand (&), slash (/), and spaces might be truncated or corrupted by some browsers. 因此，必须对这些字符进行编码。Therefore, these characters must be encoded.

span.span: An array of bytes to encode.

param.name: offset
param.span: 数组中作为编码起始点的位置。

span.span: The position in the array at which to begin encoding.
The number of items in the array to encode.

summary.span: 将 URL 中不允许使用的字符数组编码为等效十六进制字符实体。

span.span: Encodes an array of characters that are not allowed in a URL into a hexadecimal character-entity equivalent.
An array of encoded characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法中的多个 URL 编码方法由调用类。The method is called by several URL encoding methods in the class. 方法进行 URL 编码并不处于的一套 ASCII 字符的任何字符都被认为是安全的 URL。The method URL-encodes any character that is not in the set of ASCII characters that is considered to be URL-safe. 空格编码为 ASCII"`+"`字符。Spaces are encoded as the ASCII "`+"` character. ASCII URL 安全字符包括 ASCI 字符 (A 到 Z 和一个到 z)，数字 (0 到 9) 和一些标点符号。URL-safe ASCII characters include the ASCI characters (A to Z and a to z), numerals (0 to 9), and some punctuation marks. 下表列出了被视为 URL 安全 ASCII 字符的标点符号。The following table lists the punctuation marks that are considered URL-safe ASCII characters. |字符Character|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |-|连字符Hyphen| |__|下划线Underscore| |..|段 （点）Period (dot)| |!!|感叹号Exclamation mark| |*|星号 （\*）Asterisk (star)| |((|左括号Opening parenthesis| |))|右括号Closing parenthesis|

exception.span: 小于零或大于 数组的长度。

span.span: is less than zero or greater than the length of the array.
-or-

exception.span: 小于零或 加上 大于 数组的长度。

span.span: is less than zero or plus is greater than the length of the array.
is .

span.span: The string to encode.

summary.span: 对 URL 的子节进行编码。

span.span: Encodes a subsection of a URL.
A URL-encoded string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由 方法调用。The method is called by the method. 方法执行以下步骤：The method performs the following steps: - 适用的编码逻辑到的 URL （这不包括查询字符串） 的路径部分的方法。Applies the encoding logic of the method to only the path part of the URL (which excludes the query string). 该方法假定 URL 已编码为 utf-8 字符串。The method assumes that the URL is encoded as a UTF-8 string. - 将非空格编码，以便在生成编码的字符串中使用的前 128 个 ASCII 字符的一个子集。Encodes non-spaces so that only a subset of the first 128 ASCII characters is used in the resulting encoded string. 在 Unicode 值 128 和更高版本，或 32 且小于，任何字符进行 URL 编码。Any characters at Unicode value 128 and greater, or 32 and less, are URL-encoded. - 将空格编码为 %20。Encodes spaces as %20.
